## Code Style

## Project-Specific Rules
- User's project uses a custom raycast engine in C# targeting .NET Framework 4.8.
- In the file `Graphics\RaycastForm.cs`, implement texture atlas caching and minimap behavior.
- Prefer column caching and `DrawImage` optimizations when improving performance.
